entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
